name: MR BOSS GGJ2022
description:
THEME : DUALITY

Philosophical

  • Spirit vs Flesh
  • Death vs Life
  • Reality vs Appearance

Art

  • Realism vs Stylized
  • Color vs B+W

Mechanics

  • Stop vs Go
  • Left vs Right
OVERVIEW

The Player Character (PC) is living through a day at work. Certain situations (e.g. a mean boss) tempt the PC’s flesh to sin. This triggers a Fight (i.e. a puzzle; the primary game mechanic) where the Player must navigate the situation while overcoming the temptations of the flesh.
